title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate, pull, push, list, copy, delete, show, create.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; same features as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, tool-calling, structured output.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlight, model manager, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, copy, delete, show, create.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive TUI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama chat and embedding generators.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, voice, RAG, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and docker-compose examples with Open-WebUI.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Library of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Phi, Gemma, etc., ready to pull.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images, and queries local docs via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing Ollama models into channels with thread support and rate limits.

title: ollama-mistral
summary: Lightweight PyPI wrapper that auto-downloads Mistral 7B and exposes a FastAPI chat endpoint.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to integrate Ollama chat and embeddings into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app for PDF-upload → Chroma → Ollama RAG chat with citation highlighting.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for model announcements, troubleshooting, and showcase projects.
